horSquares.description: The number of horizontal squares in the grid.

verSquares.description: The number of vertical squares in the grid.

squarePixels.description: The side of each square in pixels.

squareColorHex.description: The color of the squares in the grid. Can be either RGB or RGBA.

marginPixels.description: The width of the margins between the squares in pixels.

marginColorHex.description: The color of the margins between the squares. Can be either RGB or RGBA.

grid.description: An array containing the configuration for spicific squares in the grid.

row.description: The row number of the square.

column.description: The column number of the square.

colorHex.description: The color of the square. Can be either RGB or RGBA.
